trans-unit.source: Defines a configuration element for a UDP announcement endpoint.

A UDP announcement endpoint is a standard endpoint that utilizes UDP transport protocol that specifies where a discoverable service sends announcement messages and where an announcement service listens for announcement messages.
Creates a new instance of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.UdpAnnouncementEndpointElement"></xref> class.

When called or overridden by a derived class, creates and initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpAnnouncementEndpoint"></xref> class that uses the contract description of the current Discovery protocol version and mode.
Not implemented.
A UDP announcement endpoint.
When called or overridden by a derived class, gets the type of the UDP announcement endpoint.
The type of the UDP announcement endpoint.
Converts the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> into a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpAnnouncementEndpoint"></xref>.
The service endpoint object to convert.
Gets or sets the maximum delay a service is required to wait before sending announcement messages.
The maximum delay.
Gets or sets the MulticastAddress property of a UDP announcement endpoint element.
The multicast address is the IP address from which messages are sent simultaneously to multiple host computers.
A URI address.
When called or overridden by a derived class, converts the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> to a UDP announcement endpoint.
The service endpoint to which UDP announcement configuration settings are applied.
Not implemented.
When called or overridden by a derived class, converts the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> to a UDP announcement endpoint.
The service endpoint to which UDP announcement configuration settings are applied.
Not implemented.
When called or overridden by a derived class, initializes and validates the specified instance of a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ChannelEndpointElement"></xref>.
The channel endpoint element to initialize and validate.
When called or overridden by a derived class, initializes and validates the specified instance of a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement"></xref>.
The service endpoint element to initialize and validate.

When called or overridden by a derived class, gets a collection of the configuration settings contained in a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.UdpAnnouncementEndpointElement"></xref> instance.
A collection of configuration settings.
Gets the binding settings of a UDP transport configuration element.
A UDP configuration element.
